item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 11–18 March 2024 – Seating Plan Projection
item.description:
Seating plan projection for the Belgian Chamber
76 seats needed for a majority
Opinion poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 11–18 March 2024
